sentence: Instead, Shapiro has signaled he prefers to go up against Doug Mastriano, the Pennsylvania state senator.
author: John Binder
title: Republican Heavy Hitters Line Up to Back Lou Barletta in Pennsylvania

sentence: Operatives in the state are sounding the alarm that state Sen. Doug Mastriano, the front-runner gubernatorial candidate whose bid is centered around unfounded allegations of voter fraud in 2020, is making the top office in Harrisburg out of reach.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: GOP sounds alarm in Pennsylvania as hard-line candidates rise

sentence: Former President Donald J. Trump on Saturday endorsed Doug Mastriano, a retired colonel and state senator who has propagated myriad false claims about the 2020 election and attended the protest leading up to the Capitol riot, in the Republican primary race for governor of Pennsylvania.
title: Trump Backs Doug Mastriano, a Far-Right Loyalist, to Lead Pennsylvania
